participant_1.background:
I play soccer on the weekends to keep myself active and to have some fun.
i haven t had luck with finding a job.
i like gardening.
I treasure my collection of vintage horror movies, which I love to watch with my grandchildren.
i spend an hour getting ready in the morning.

participant_2.background:
I like to dye my hair fire engine red, because it's bold and makes me feel like I can take on anything.
i have long hair for a boy.
i am a mother of two.
I enjoy the Fourth of July because my favorite color is red, white, and blue.
I'm not sure what my ethnicity is.

content.text: Nice to meet you! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to dye my hair fire engine red, it's bold and makes me feel like I can take on anything
That's cool! I like to play soccer on the weekends to keep myself active
I like to garden, it's a great way to relax
That sounds nice! I'm not very good at gardening, but I enjoy it
What do you like to do on the 4th of July?
I like to watch fireworks, it's always fun to see the different displays
Me too! I also like to grill out and eat lots of food
Sounds like a great time! I'm glad you enjoy it
What are you doing for the 4th of July this year?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about going to a fireworks show
That sounds like a good plan! I hope you have a great tim
